creditline: Gift of Mrs. Eugene J. Carpenter and Olivia Carpenter Coan in memory of Eugene J. Carpenter
description: bowl, large, blue on white porcelain, decorated with petal-shaped panels containing flowers and birds; a medallion in the bottom of the bowl shows bird and flowers. This is surrounded by four hawthorne trees, and the inner rim is decorated with five floral medallions with intervening diaper design.
title: Bowl
